H0.text: How many verses make up the national anthem God Save The Queen. 1

H1.text: How many verses make up the national anthem God Save The Queen. 2

H2.text: How many verses make up the national anthem God Save The Queen. 4

H3.text: How many verses make up the national anthem God Save The Queen. 3

A4.text: In general, only one verse is sung.

A5.text: Sometimes two verses are sung and, on certain occasions, three.

A6.text: An additional stanza sung second was previously considered part of the standard lyrics in the UK:

A7.text: Since its first publication, different verses have been added and taken away and, even today, different publications include various selections of verses in various orders.
